summary: Config for display-0, a Raspberry Pi with piscreen display, wireless, and auto-login to i3.
notes: Nixpkgs overlay for makeModulesClosure allowing missing. Imports base config and piscreen.nix. Swap UUID ea2a84bb-a66c-4291-ac03-597999559a5d, /home ext4 UUID b3c6f24a-010d-4f16-a3b6-37859054234d. rtl-sdr package. Hostname display-0. Boot: ZFS false, initrd kernel vc4, bcm2835_dma, i2c_bcm2835. Kernel params console ttyS0, fb2. Generic-extlinux bootloader. Hardware: bluetooth false, redistributable firmware true. Networking: wlan0 DHCP, wireless enabled on wlan0. Services: display manager default i3, auto-login John88. Xserver video fbdevhw/fbdev, resolution 480x320, device section fbdev /dev/fb2.
reasoning: Specialized for small touchscreen display on Raspberry Pi, enabling dedicated low-power embedded display functionality. Integrates wireless networking and auto-login for kiosk-like or monitoring use, with piscreen overlay for hardware support.
